author: Peter McCutcheon
title: 'Our school hasn't given us any tools': Parents finding it tough to teach kids at home
description: Like many other parents around Australia, Sarah Praag is an accidental homeschooler. Unsure what to do, the mother of four is turning to teaching material from websites and advice from social media groups.
content:
Posted April 02, 2020 06:08:10 Like many other parents around Australia, Sarah Praag is an accidental homeschooler. Key points:
